title: Biomedical Sciences | Ohio State College of Medicine
description: Here is some information from The Ohio State University College of Medicine I wanted to share with you.
sitename: The Ohio State University College of Medicine
cleaned_text: Our PhD in Biomedical Sciences is offered through the College of Medicine and designed to provide high-quality training to prepare graduates for successful careers in biomedical research. Our goal is to train talented, predoctoral students about interdisciplinary approaches to biomedical research, critical thinking and technical proficiencies necessary to thrive in the rapidly evolving fields within biomedical sciences. The BSGP is an umbrella program that includes faculty from multiple departments. Students explore 11 different areas of research emphasis. Required courses are the same for all students. We seek to train our students to become part of the biomedical scientist workforce and to make meaningful scientific discoveries in academia, industry and government. Register now for an upcoming virtual info session Admissions There are many ways to pursue a scientific career in biomedicine. Our program will provide you with an outstanding opportunity to achieve your goals. We offer helpful tips for [before](/education/phd/biomedical-sciences/admissions/before-you-apply) and [after](/education/phd/biomedical-sciences/admissions/after-you-apply) you apply to the program. [Learn how to apply](https://medicine.osu.edu/education/phd/biomedical-sciences/admissions) Curriculum Designed to allow graduate students to build a solid foundation for their professional lives as biomedical researchers, the BSGP [curriculum](/education/phd/biomedical-sciences/curriculum) maintains high standards of intellectual rigor, fosters creativity and passion for research. Research Areas While our program promotes collaborative interactions, each student will develop a strong core of expertise that can be within an established area of research. Most students focus their studies on one or more of several established areas of research emphasis, completing specific curricular requirements. Our People The BSGP is comprised of over 300 [faculty members](/education/phd/biomedical-sciences/our-people/our-faculty) from nineteen departments across Ohio State's College of Medicine. This interdisciplinary team enables our [graduate students](/education/phd/biomedical-sciences/our-people/current-students) to build solid foundations and make high impact [discoveries](/education/phd/biomedical-sciences/our-people/student-accomplishments) as researchers. Where are our alumni now?
